name: GOODNIGHT (itch)
description:
CONTROLS

Keyboard: X to jump, Z to chill, ▲ ▼ ◀ ▶ to move, ENTER to start/show stats.

Gamepad: A to jump, B to chill, ▲ ▼ ◀ ▶ to move, START to start/show stats.

✦✦✦

A Game By Its Cover 2018 entry based on Sam Boucher's GOODNIGHT Famicase cart. Currently in development.

Art by Adam Bing, with tiles from Adam Saltsman's Monochrome Caves.

Team up with your unconscious mind to find your way out of a dream that trapped you in. Will you ever wake up?
